Detailed Description

Vector class compound of 4 floating point real numbers.

This is probably the most used class in the whole system. One can use flyVector with 3 or 4 floats, as in the first case the 4th value remains zero. One must address the components of flyVector by the letters x, y, z and w, or by indexes 0 to 3, and the operations of negation, normalization and cross product with another flyVector object are provided.
